author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower valve blocking tip…the 1/2” OSB in this wall created a problem, it bumped out the valve too much. So we ripped 1/2” of the 2x4 and toe screwed it to the studs. That placed the valve at the correct depth for the backer board and tile 🔥#bathroomremodel #plumbing #showervalve #diy
title: Shower Valve Blocking Tip - #shorts #homerepairtutor #plumbing
